messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Please, send the police!
What's the problem there?
He killed my friends!
What's the problem? I need to know.
The police stop! With a gun! With a gun!
Please, hurry up! He's killing my girlfriend!
They're on the way, but I need more information. Who's doing this?
With guns! They'll break the guns!
Who has the guns?
You've got to kill him!
I need you to calm down.
Why do you need somebody there?
He's killing my friends.
Who's killing your friend?
My chimpanzee!
Your chimpanzee is killing your friend?
Please, hurry up! He's got a gun!
Someone is on the way. Where are you?
Please, shoot him! The monkey's beating up on somebody!
What is the monkey doing?
He ripped her face off! He's trying to attack me, please, hurry!
I need you to calm down. They're on the way. Can you push him away?
Please, hurry up!
They're on the way, ma'am. Is the monkey still with your friend?
He killed her, please.
Are you there with your friend?
He's trying to attack me now.
I need you to calm down so you can help your friend. Are you there with your friend?
How fast can you get them here?
They're on the way. If the monkey moves away from your friend, let me know.
I can't. She's dead. He ripped her apart. Everything.
No, just breathe, okay? I need you to stay with me until they get there.
Please, hurry!
They're on the way. I need you to calm down.
Is the monkey still with your friend or is your friend still on the floor?
She's dead. I tried to push him away, but he's still there.
Do not get any closer, okay? They're on the way.
If the monkey moves away, let me know, okay?
No, he's still there.
Okay. Is your friend alive?
No, she's dead. She's not moving.
I need you to stay on the phone with me. They're on the way, okay?
Please, hurry. Have them shoot him. He's going to attack me.
I need you to stay in your car and lock the windows. Help is on the way. Stay calm.
He's walking around. He's hurt!
Stay in your car. Do not get out. The police are on the way.
Please have them shoot him!
They will. Just stay in your car.
They're here, but he's not dead!
I need you to stay in your car. They know about the situation.
He's coming after me!
Stay in your car. The police will handle it.
Please hurry!
Stay calm. Help is there. Hang on.
He's still moving. He's still alive!
They will keep shooting until he's no longer a threat. Stay with me.
I don't see any officers.
That's fine. Just stay in your car. They're handling it.
